name: Echeveria Serrana
description: Echeveria Serrana is a stunning low-growing succulent with thick, fleshy leaves arranged in a rosette shape. Its leaves store water, making it drought-tolerant and easy to care for. This plant thrives in bright, indirect sunlight and can add a touch of elegance to any indoor garden.
care: Prefers well-draining soil and minimal watering. Avoid touching its sensitive leaves to prevent damage.

name: Gymnocalycium saglionis
description: Gymnocalycium saglionis is a spherical cactus known for its striking appearance and bright flowers that bloom after 2-3 years of growth. It has ribbed, spiny skin and thrives in well-lit spaces, making it a unique addition to any indoor plant collection.
care: Loves bright light, requires moderate watering, and benefits from a cool, dry winter to encourage flowering.

name: Gasteria Little Warty
description: Gasteria Little Warty is a compact and attractive succulent with thick, textured leaves that feature unique warty patterns. It’s perfect for small spaces and thrives with minimal care, making it a great choice for beginners.
care: Thrives in bright, indirect light and requires occasional watering during its active growth phase.

name: Crassula Gollum
description: Crassula Gollum, also known as the 'Money Tree,' features tubular, jade-like leaves that give it a striking appearance. This succulent is often considered a symbol of good fortune and is ideal for bright, sunny spaces.
care: Avoid overwatering and place in a bright spot to encourage healthy growth.

name: Aloe Humilis
description: Aloe Humilis is a small, hardy aloe variety with spiky, bluish-green leaves. Known for its drought tolerance, it is a great choice for indoor gardeners seeking an easy-to-maintain plant.
care: Water only when the soil is dry. Provide bright, indirect sunlight for optimal growth.

name: Echinocactus
description: Echinocactus is a slow-growing, long-living cactus with a spherical shape. It produces rare yellow flowers and is highly adaptable to various indoor conditions, making it a popular choice for cactus enthusiasts.
care: Prefers bright light and well-draining soil. Rotate periodically to ensure even growth.

name: Tephrocactus Articulatus
description: Tephrocactus Articulatus, also known as the 'Pinecone Cactus,' is a rare species with segmented stems resembling pinecones. It is a unique and decorative choice for indoor gardening enthusiasts.
care: Requires full sun and minimal watering. Repot every three years to maintain healthy growth.

name: Sedum rubrotinctum Aurora
description: Sedum rubrotinctum Aurora is a colorful succulent with plump, jelly-like leaves that change to a reddish hue in sunlight. Its vibrant appearance makes it a popular choice for adding color to indoor spaces.
care: Water moderately and place in a sunny location for its best coloration.

name: Succulent Mix
description: The Succulent Mix is a curated collection of small, easy-to-care-for succulents, perfect for beginners or as a gift. Each plant is handpicked to ensure variety and aesthetic appeal.
care: Ideal for sunny windowsills and requires minimal watering.

name: Crassula
description: Crassula, commonly known as the 'Money Tree,' is a small, tree-like succulent plant belonging to the Crassulaceae family. It is popular in indoor gardening due to its resemblance to a tree of happiness. While it rarely blooms indoors, in its natural habitat, it often flowers with clusters of delicate blossoms.
care: Best suited for bright spots with indirect sunlight. Avoid overwatering, and wipe leaves occasionally to remove dust.

name: Chamaedorea elegans
description: Chamaedorea elegans, commonly known as the Parlor Palm, is an easy-to-grow indoor palm tree that enhances air humidity and purifies the air. It thrives in office spaces, living rooms, and labs, creating a positive and soothing atmosphere.
care: Prefers diffused light. Water generously as the soil dries out; reduce watering in winter. Regular misting is recommended.

name: Syngonium Neon Pink
description: Syngonium Neon Pink is a vibrant plant with arrow-shaped leaves that shift to segmented forms as it matures. Perfect for hanging pots or as a climbing plant, it’s known for its bright pink foliage, especially prominent on younger leaves.
care: Thrives in diffused light. Water generously as the soil dries out; mist leaves regularly to maintain humidity.

name: Fittonia
description: Fittonia is a small, colorful plant known for its vibrant, vein-patterned leaves. It’s perfect for terrariums and small spaces and helps purify the air. This plant is ideal for those seeking to create a calming environment at home.
care: Prefers bright, diffused light or partial shade. Keep the soil consistently moist and mist leaves daily to maintain humidity.

name: Selaginella Martensi Jori
description: Selaginella Martensi Jori is a unique, ancient plant species known for its creeping or upright stems. Its small, glossy leaves and vibrant green color make it an excellent choice for terrariums and humid environments.
care: Requires high humidity and diffused light. Keep the soil consistently moist and mist frequently with warm, soft water.

name: Radermachera chinensis
description: Radermachera chinensis, or the China Doll Plant, is an evergreen shrub with lush, glossy green leaves. It’s perfect for bright spaces, and while it rarely flowers indoors, its foliage makes it an elegant addition to any interior.
care: Prefers bright, indirect light. Keep the soil slightly moist and mist occasionally to enhance its appearance.

name: Chlorophytum
description: Chlorophytum, or Spider Plant, is a hardy, low-maintenance plant known for its striped, arching leaves. It’s highly adaptable and purifies the air, making it ideal for any indoor environment.
care: Thrives in moderate light but tolerates partial shade. Allow soil to dry out slightly between waterings. Mist occasionally for better foliage.

name: Dracaena marginata
description: Dracaena marginata, or Dragon Tree, is a striking plant with slender, arching leaves edged in red. It’s a low-maintenance choice that adds a modern, tropical touch to indoor spaces.
care: Prefers diffused light or partial shade. Water only when the soil is dry; mist regularly to maintain humidity.

name: Ficus elastica Tineke
description: Ficus elastica Tineke is a variegated rubber plant with striking green, cream, and pink hues on its large, waxy leaves. It’s a visually appealing plant that thrives in bright, indirect light.
care: Prefers bright, indirect light. Water when the soil dries out, and mist leaves occasionally to maintain moisture.

name: Croton Petra
description: Croton Petra is an ornamental foliage plant celebrated for its vibrant, multicolored leaves. It’s a perfect choice for adding bold, tropical energy to any space.
care: Prefers bright, direct sunlight. Water generously as the soil dries out; mist leaves regularly to maintain humidity.

name: Scindapsus Argyreus maculata
description: Scindapsus Argyreus maculata is a versatile trailing plant with silver-speckled leaves. It’s ideal for hanging baskets and brings a touch of greenery to any room.
care: Thrives in diffused light or partial shade. Water generously as the soil dries out and mist leaves daily to maintain humidity.

name: Spathiphyllum
description: Spathiphyllum, also known as Peace Lily, is a beautiful and easy-to-care flowering plant with dark green leaves and elegant white blooms. It is perfect for purifying the air and adding tranquility to any indoor space.
flowering: White blooms during spring and summer
care: Prefers high humidity and consistently moist soil. Avoid drafts and temperature fluctuations.

name: Kalanchoe
description: Kalanchoe is a compact flowering succulent with vibrant, long-lasting blooms. Known for its drought tolerance, it’s perfect for sunny spots indoors.
flowering: Bright flowers in red, pink, yellow, or white
care: Thrives in bright sunlight and requires watering only when soil is completely dry.

name: Cyclamen Pink
description: Cyclamen is a perennial flowering plant with butterfly-like petals in pink and white hues. Its elegant blooms bring vibrancy and charm to any space.
flowering: Pink and white blooms from October to March
care: Prefers well-draining soil and indirect light. Avoid waterlogging and keep away from direct sunlight.

name: Rose Cream
description: Patio roses are compact flowering shrubs with bright blooms and dark green foliage. Perfect for adding color and elegance to small indoor spaces.
flowering: Various colors including red, pink, yellow, and white
care: Requires regular watering and bright light. Ensure proper drainage to avoid root rot.

name: Rhododendron
description: Rhododendrons are stunning flowering shrubs with vibrant blooms and lush green foliage. They add a touch of sophistication to indoor gardens.
flowering: Shades of pink, red, white, and purple
care: Prefers bright, indirect light and consistent moisture. Avoid overwatering and provide good airflow.

name: Begonia Blooming
description: Begonia Elatior is a hybrid flowering plant with vibrant, rainbow-colored blooms. It’s ideal for decorating shaded interiors or bright balconies.
flowering: Bright blooms from spring to autumn
care: Needs acidic, slightly moist soil. Avoid overwatering and place in bright, indirect light.

name: Schlumbergera
description: Schlumbergera, commonly known as the Christmas Cactus, features segmented stems and vibrant blooms. It’s a classic choice for winter displays.
flowering: Pink, red, or white blooms in winter
care: Thrives in bright, indirect light. Water moderately and mist regularly to maintain humidity.

name: Phalaenopsis Orchid
description: Phalaenopsis orchids, or moth orchids, are known for their elegant and long-lasting blooms. They are a popular choice for their beauty and simplicity of care.
flowering: Pink, white, or yellow blooms 2-3 times a year
care: Requires a transparent pot for root photosynthesis. Keep in bright, indirect light and water weekly.

name: Dendrobium Orchid
description: Dendrobium orchids are exotic flowering plants with long-lasting blooms. They bring a tropical vibe to interiors and require minimal care.
flowering: White, pink, or purple blooms throughout the year
care: Thrives in stable conditions with indirect light. Water regularly but avoid overwatering.

name: Cyclamen White
description: Cyclamen is a perennial flowering plant with butterfly-like petals in pink and white hues. Its elegant blooms bring vibrancy and charm to any space.
flowering: Pink and white blooms from October to March
care: Prefers well-draining soil and indirect light. Avoid waterlogging and keep away from direct sunlight.

name: Rose Red
description: Patio roses are compact flowering shrubs with bright blooms and dark green foliage. Perfect for adding color and elegance to small indoor spaces.
flowering: Various colors including red, pink, yellow, and white
care: Requires regular watering and bright light. Ensure proper drainage to avoid root rot.
